divs: Sighting DetailsWe were driving down Telegraph near 94, a large triangular object with lights on three corners starting to circle in an unusual pattern. I thought it was a plane as we were 5 miles from the airport. It looked unusual to me because the lights were not flashing, it was too low in the sky and made an unusual tight turn. As I watched it came to a stop and just hovered in place. We were driving and unable to stop immediatly to watch it on a very busy road. We turned around the car arround and the object was gone. Hoping that someone else saw this.
Summary: Driving down Telegraph large triangular object starting to circle and then hover in one place. Distict non pulsating lights to make up a triangle.
